010package imagingbook.common.histogram;
011
012// TODO: needs revision, histogram should get its own class.
013
014public class Util {
015
016        static int[] makeGaussianHistogram () {
017                return makeGaussianHistogram(128, 50);
018        }
019
020        public static int[] makeGaussianHistogram (double mean, double sigma) {
021                int[] h = new int[256];
022                double sigma2 = 2 * sigma * sigma;
023                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
024                        double x = mean - i;
025                        double g = Math.exp(-(x * x) / sigma2) / sigma;
026                        h[i] = (int) Math.round(10000 * g);
027                }
028                return h;
029        }
030
031        public static double[] normalizeHistogram (double[] h) {
032                // find max histogram entry
033                double max = h[0];
034                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
035                        if (h[i] > max)
036                                max = h[i];
037                }
038                if (max == 0) return null;
039                // normalize
040                double[] hn = new double[h.length];
041                double s = 1.0/max;
042                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
043                        hn[i] = s * h[i];
044                }
045                return hn;
046        }
047
048        //------------------------------------------------------
049        
050        public static double[] normalizeHistogram (int[] h) {
051                // find the max histogram entry
052                int max = h[0];
053                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
054                        if (h[i] > max)
055                                max = h[i];
056                }
057                if (max == 0) return null;
058                // normalize
059                double[] hn = new double[h.length];
060                double s = 1.0/max;
061                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
062                        hn[i] = s * h[i];
063                }
064                return hn;
065        }
066
067        public static double[] Cdf (int[] h) {
068                // returns the cumul. probability distribution function (cdf) for histogram h
069                int K = h.length;
070                int n = 0;              // sum all histogram values             
071                for (int i=0; i<K; i++) {       
072                        n = n + h[i]; 
073                }
074                double[] P = new double[K];
075                int c = h[0];
076                P[0] = (double) c / n;
077                for (int i = 1; i < K; i++) {
078                c = c + h[i];
079                P[i] = (double) c / n;
080            }
081            return P;
082        }
083
084        static double[] Pdf (int[] h) {
085                // returns the probability distribution function (pdf) for histogram h
086                int K = h.length;
087                int n = 0;                      // sum all histogram values     
088                for (int i = 0; i < K; i++) {
089                        n = n + h[i]; 
090                }
091                double[] p = new double[K];
092                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
093                        p[i] =  (double) h[i] / n;
094                }
095                return p;
096        }
097
098}
